はじめて「マジセミ」をご検討される方へ: For those considering Majisemi for the first time
ウェビナーを活用した東南アジア進出支援: Support for expanding into Southeast Asia using webinars
日本国内向けとほぼ同じ価格で、東南アジア向けにウェビナー配信が可能。: Webinars can be delivered to Southeast Asia at almost the same price as for Japan.
貴社は日本語（又は英語）でのプレゼン動画（＋スライド）を用意するだけ。: Your company only needs to prepare a presentation video (plus slides) in Japanese (or English).
現地語での字幕の追加、スライドの翻訳、当日の配信まで、全てマジセミ側で対応。: Majisemi handles everything from adding subtitles in local languages, translating slides, to the day of delivery.
オプションで、ウェビナー後のリードフォローや、現地語対応済みのウェビナー動画の２: Options include follow-up after the webinar and secondary use of webinar videos with local language support.
東南アジアで開催される展示会への共同出展も推進中。: Promoting joint exhibition at trade shows held in Southeast Asia.
メールで資料案内した場合の: The response rate when sending materials via email
質問や要望を受けながらのデモ、工場視察: Demos and factory tours while receiving questions and requests
事前/事後アンケートはもちろん、講演中の投票や質問など: Pre/post surveys, as well as polls and questions during the presentation
少人数ウェビナーの場合、貴社の商品・サービスが解決できる課題について、困っている: In small webinars, people troubled by issues your products/services can solve participate
質疑応答などのコミュニケーションを通じた信頼関係の構築: Building trust through communication like Q&A
何も接点がないところから、いきなりのテレアポやDMは不信感につながります。: Cold calls or direct mail from no prior contact can lead to distrust.

メール配信も全件に送付するのではなく、設定したテーマに関心が高い方を優先して配信: Emails are not sent to all entries, but prioritized for those highly interested in the set theme.

またセミナーの内容（企画）について「製品紹介」ではなく「課題解決型セミナー」とさ: Furthermore, the seminar content (planning) will be a 'problem-solving seminar' rather than a 'product introduction'. The product introduction will be conducted in the latter half of the presentation. The seminar content will be decided in consultation with the Majisemi planning members. It may not be possible to hold it on the theme your company desires. If you wish to decide the theme yourself, please use the Visitor Plan.

集客人数が定員未達だった場合、未達分の集客枠は翌月以降に持ち越し: If the number of participants does not meet the quota, the remaining slots can be carried over to subsequent months
@1万円で追加集客枠の購入が可能: Additional participant slots can be purchased for @10,000 yen
直近過去3回の貴社主催セミナーへの（課金対象の）お申込が1回以上あった方が、当該: If someone who has registered for your company's past three seminars (subject to charges) registers again for the current seminar, they will not be charged for the current seminar (fan development)
その他、一般公開した講演資料DL者のリード提供、ブランディングダッシュボードの提: Other benefits include providing leads from those who downloaded publicly available presentation materials, offering a branding dashboard, and providing trend analysis tools
月会費で10名、追加集客で20名集客した場合: If 10 participants are attracted through the monthly fee and 20 through additional slots
「セミナー後の商談化に課題がある」「自社WebサイトのコンテンツやSEOを強化し: If you face challenges in converting seminars into business discussions or wish to enhance your website content and SEO, please consider our value set plans mentioned later.

※集客人数を正確に把握するため、弊社にてお申込みページを準備し、リストを貴社にご: *To accurately track the number of attendees, we will prepare the registration page and provide the list to your company.
※定員に達した場合、申込受付をストップ致します。: *If the capacity is reached, we will stop accepting applications.
※契約は自動的に３か月更新され、その後も同様になります。: *The contract is automatically renewed every three months and will continue thereafter.
※退会の際は、退会月の前月の月末までメールにてご連絡ください。: *To withdraw, please notify us by email by the end of the month prior to the withdrawal month.
※商談保証付きに関してはお受けできない場合がございます。: *We may not be able to accommodate guarantees with business negotiations.
3ヵ月毎に自動更新のプランです。30名の集客と3件の商談（アポ）を保証します。: This is a plan that automatically renews every 3 months. We guarantee 30 attendees and 3 business meetings (appointments).
セミナー内容の企画、集客、当日の運営、当日参加者への資料送付までを弊社にて行いま: Our company will handle the planning of seminar content, attracting attendees, managing the day, and sending materials to participants on the day.
マジフォロは料金に含まれています。: Majifolo is included in the fee.
初回セミナーで30人・3件に満たない場合、その四半期、又は翌四半期以降に繰り越す: If the initial seminar does not reach 30 people and 3 cases, it will be carried over to that quarter or the next quarter,
追加でセミナー開催致します。（基本は初回達成を目指します）: We will hold additional seminars. (The basic goal is to achieve it in the first attempt)
3ヵ月毎に30人の集客と3件の商談を保証: Guarantee of 30 attendees and 3 business meetings every 3 months
未達の場合は未達分を次回以降のセミナーに繰り越し: If not achieved, carry over the shortfall to future seminars
31人以上追加開催の場合は1人申込13,500円: For additional events with more than 31 people, 13,500 yen per registration
参加者への電話・メールでのアポ取り: Appointment setting via phone and email for participants

マジセミのフォロー専門スタッフが、セミナー終了直後に参加者、欠席者に対して、メー: Majisemi's follow-up specialist staff will follow up with participants and absentees via email and phone immediately after the seminar ends.
セミナーの講演内容から、SEOを意識した3,000字程度の記事を作成します。貴社: We will create an article of about 3,000 characters with SEO in mind based on the seminar content. By publishing it on your website, you can promote content marketing.
セミナー動画をご提供させていただき、２次利用していただくためのオプションです。: This is an option to provide seminar videos for secondary use.
※一定の利用制限内であれば無料でご提供いたします。トライアル時は、有料、無料とも: *We offer it for free within certain usage limits. During the trial, neither paid nor free provision is available.
セミナー動画をYoutube等に掲載する場合、長時間の動画は嫌われる傾向がありま: When posting seminar videos on YouTube, etc., long videos tend to be disliked. Therefore, we will edit and provide them in about 5 to 10 minutes.
セミナー申込者の内、当日欠席された方に対して、当日の動画を視聴していただきます。: For those who registered for the seminar but were absent on the day, we will allow them to view the day's video.
過去マジセミで開催した録画を使って、手間なく追加のウェビナーを開催します。: Using recordings from past Majisemi events, we will hold additional webinars without hassle.
過去に貴社のウェビナーにお申し込みいただいた方（貴社の見込み客）に対して、より商: We will plan and hold a theme that leads to more business discussions (appointments) for those who have previously registered for your webinars (your prospective customers), such as competitor comparisons, product introductions, demos, etc.
貴社セミナーの運営を代行します。申込みページの作成、申込者の管理、Zoomの貸出: We will handle the operation of your seminar. We will take care of tasks such as creating the registration page, managing registrants, lending Zoom, and moderating on the day. (Attracting attendees is not included. Please handle it yourself.)
マジセミ代表 寺田が、貴社セミナーでのプレゼンや対談、パネルディスカッションのフ: Majisemi representative Terada will facilitate presentations, discussions, and panel discussions at your seminar. Please consult us about the theme.
“エバンジェリストAI”デジタル寺田による基調講演代行: "Evangelist AI" Digital Terada's keynote speech outsourcing
生成AIを活用した“エバンジェリストAI”デジタル寺田が、貴社のウェビナーで基調: "Evangelist AI" Digital Terada, utilizing generative AI, will deliver a keynote speech at your webinar.
・セミナーで講演するが、講演原稿・スライドを作成する時間がない: - Want to give a seminar presentation but don't have time to create the script and slides
・プレゼンが上手な社員がいない（又は忙しい）ため、プレゼンまで含めて代行してほし: - No skilled presenters among employees (or they are busy), so want to outsource the presentation as well
Youtubeの検索や、Googleの動画検索で上位表示を狙うための施策です。マ: This is a strategy to aim for top rankings in YouTube searches and Google video searches. Majisemi will create a custom AI avatar for your company and produce video content explaining terms. Scripts can also be delivered, and blog utilization is possible.
貴社の製品の強みを強力に認知させるための競合製品比較動画を作成します。マジセミが: We will create a competitive product comparison video to strongly recognize the strengths of your product. Majisemi will create a custom AI avatar for your company and produce product comparison video content. It can also be distributed in webinars.
全てのサービスにおいて、マジカン（マジセミ管理画面）から「本申込」をしていただい: For all services, if you cancel after making a 'formal application' through Majikan (Majisemi management screen) or after we receive the order form/application form, a 100% cancellation fee will apply.
但し、ウェビナー開催については、ビジターは20名分のキャンセル料金、マジセミ倶楽: However, for webinar events, the cancellation fee is capped at 20 attendees for visitors and 30 attendees for Majisemi Club.
マジフォロについては、ビジターの場合は20名分、マジセミ倶楽部の場合は30名分の: For Majifolo, the cancellation fee is capped at 20 attendees for visitors and 30 attendees for Majisemi Club.
ウェビナー開催において、タイトル、告知文などの調整が遅れて、ウェビナーの公開が開: If adjustments to the title, announcement text, etc., are delayed and the webinar cannot be published by 5 PM, 10 business days before the event date, it will be treated as a cancellation and the above cancellation fee will be charged.
マジセミ倶楽部の退会時、集客枠残について返金できません。: No refunds will be given for remaining attendee slots upon withdrawal from Majisemi Club.
マジセミ倶楽部の主旨を鑑み、マジセミ倶楽部の契約開始から１年以内の解約の場合、ペ: Considering the purpose of Majisemi Club, a penalty is set for cancellations within one year from the start of the Majisemi Club contract. Please understand. (We will charge the difference from the visitor fee)
開催4週間前を過ぎての発注は、料金が割り増しになります。: Orders placed after four weeks before the event will incur a surcharge.
（開催4週間前以前の発注）: (Order placed more than four weeks before the event)
開催4週間前を過ぎての発注: Order placed after four weeks before the event
開催3週間前を過ぎての発注: Order placed after three weeks before the event
開催4週間前の本申込みが間に合わない場合、割増料金の設定はございませんが、ご相談: If the formal application cannot be completed four weeks before the event, there is no surcharge, but we will postpone the event after consultation.
■基本的には6週間前から打ち合わせし、開催4週間前に本申込みいただくスケジュール: ■ Basically, meetings start six weeks in advance, and the formal application is made four weeks before the event.

Yuichi Terada
IT・製造業専門セミナーマーケティングサービス「マジセミ」の運営: Operation of the IT and manufacturing industry specialized seminar marketing service 'Majisemi'
昨年実績 約1,0００回開催、延べ動員数 約6０,000人（2023年）: Last year's achievements: approximately 1,000 events held, total attendance approximately 60,000 people (2023)
デジタル関連のプロダクトやサービスとの新たな出会いと体験の場を創造することで\n: Creating opportunities for new encounters and experiences with digital-related products and services to promote the development of domestic industries and the advancement of engineers.
そのために、提供企業の規模の大小に関係なく、優れた技術やその可能性を広く社会に伝: To achieve this, we convey the potential and excellence of technology widely to society, regardless of the size of the providing company.
エンドユーザーに対して、技術そのものではなく、その技術でどのような課題が解決でき: We clearly communicate to end-users not the technology itself, but how it can solve their problems.
2025年には、年間2,000回のウェビナーを開催する: By 2025, we aim to host 2,000 webinars annually.
